Column.Name: Award Data Formatted
Output Type List
Column.DefaultValueFormula: ARRAY( "Standalone Contract", "Subcontract", //Contract under an existing headagreement "Panel Contract", "Procurement", "Purchase Order" )

Column.Name: Set Context Record as Parent of Award
Head Agreement RecordID
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Award Output Override] = "Subcontract", [Head Agreement RecordID] = NULL ), "A head agreement record ID must be specified when awarding a subcontract" )

Column.Name: Award Description
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Award Description] = NULL, [Award EFormType] <> NULL, [Award RecordID] <> NULL ), DB_LOOKUP( "Description", [Award EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [Award RecordID]) ), [Award Description] )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("RecordID", "Description"), [Context EFormType], "[LineNumber] = 1" );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( $data, $(i, item) HASH( "value", ARRAY_INDEX($item, 1), "text", ARRAY_INDEX($item, 2) ) )

Label.Text: This record will be set as the parent of the created record

Information.Text: Does not apply to Subcontracts as those will get parented by the Head Agreement record (if specified, otherwise will have no parent)

Label.Text: Head Agreement RecordID - Only applicable if awarding a 'Subcontract' (Contract under a head agreement)

Information.Text: Awarded Subcontract will become a child of this rather than the Context EFormType

Label.Text: Created Procurement RecordID - if output is Procurement
Created Head Agreement RecordID - if output is Panel Contract
Created PO Agreement RecordID - if output is Purchase Order

CheckBox.Text: Set context record as parent of awarded record
CheckBox.ReferencedDataColumn: Set Context Record as Parent of Award

Label.Text: What kind of record is being created

CheckBox.Text: Limit selection pool to only allow children of context record

Label.Text: Provides a list of all entities that are available for selection.
Award Data - Populated from award button

Binding.Expression:
LET $lines := ARRAY_JOIN(ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_TRANSPOSE(ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Award Status], $(i,item) ARRAY($i, $item) ), $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEX($item, 2) <> "Awarded" )), 1), ", ");
RETURN "Runs for all lines that are not yet marked as awarded." & NEWLINE() & NEWLINE() & "Will run for the following lines: " & IF($lines = "", "None", $lines)
ARRAY_DISTINCT([Award Output Override] = ARRAY(ARRAY_FIRST(EACH [Award Output Override])))

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( ARRAY_DISTINCT(EACH [Award Status]) = ARRAY("Not Awarded"), NULL, [Created Procurement RecordID] )
IF( ARRAY_DISTINCT(EACH [Award Status]) = ARRAY("Not Awarded"), NULL, [Created Head Agreement RecordID] )
IF( ARRAY_DISTINCT(EACH [Award Status]) = ARRAY("Not Awarded"), NULL, [Head Agreement RecordID] )
IF( ARRAY_DISTINCT(EACH [Award Status]) = ARRAY("Not Awarded"), NULL, [Created PO Agreement RecordID] )

Information.Text:
Unlinks the award to this record, enabling you to re-run the award.
Does not delete the award record.

Binding.Expression: AND( EACH [Award RecordID] <> ARRAY(), EACH [Award RecordID] <> NULL() )

Event.Name: Award - Head Agreement
Event.Description: If an award would create a new head agreement this will create the head agreement record.

AlternativeParentRecord.RecordID:
IF( [Procurement Planning RecordID] <> NULL, [Procurement Planning RecordID],
NULL )

Event.Name: Award - Panel Contract
Event.Description: For each successful respondent this will add the respondents details to the head agreement - this creates individual contracts for each respondent under a new Head Agreement

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.Description: Update Head Agreement with Vendor/Subcontract Details

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula:
LET $contractRisks := DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Risk", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Risk To] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract'", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Procurement", [Procurement Planning RecordID])) );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( $contractRisks, $(i,item) ARRAY("Risk", $item) )

Event.Name: Award - Procurement
Event.Description: If an award would create a new procurement this will create the procurement record. For each successful respondent this will add the respondents details to the procurement - this DOES NOT create individual procurements for each respondent.

Event.Name: Award - Purchase Order
Event.Description: Creates 1 PO Agreement and one purchase order per successful vendor

Event.Name: Award - Standalone Contract
Event.Description: Creates one standalone contract per successful vendor

AlternativeParentRecord.RecordID:
IF( [Procurement Planning RecordID] <> NULL, [Procurement Planning RecordID],
NULL )

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula:
LET $contractRisks := DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Risk", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Risk To] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract'", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Procurement", [Procurement Planning RecordID])) );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( $contractRisks, $(i,item) ARRAY("Risk", $item) )

Event.Name: Award - Subcontract
Event.Description: Creates one subcontract per successful vendor. A head agreement recordid must be provided for this to run.

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula:
LET $contractRisks := DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Risk", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Risk To] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract'", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Procurement", [Procurement Planning RecordID])) );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( $contractRisks, $(i,item) ARRAY("Risk", $item) )

Event.Name: Create Vendor Record
Event.Description: Created from VP Response when the respondent doesn't have an existing vendor record

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.Description: Gets data from respondent record and pushes it to a new vendor record

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Override Output Type] <> TRUE, HASH_GET([Meaningful Award Data], "Output"), [Award Output Override] )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Check if vendor exists / store vendor recordID

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Populate Selection Lists (make the selection list look correct)
Call appropriate award task based on output type

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set Award Status on awarded line

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH_MERGE( target.[Process Completion Hash - Stored], HASH_MERGE( HASH("Award", TRUE), HASH("Award - Date Complete", NOW()), ) )
